items.careInstruction: USE PRESS CLOTH. THE PRODUCTS CENTRAL CREASE IS RESIN-TREATED. DURING A FINISHING PRESS OR IRONING ON THE RESIN-TREATED PART, PLEASE MAKE SURE THE PRESS OR THE IRON STAYS IN PLACE, SO AS NOT TO CREATE A DOUBLE FOLD ON THE CENTRAL CREASE. USE CLEANING NET. WASH DARK COLORS SEPARATELY. NO OPTICAL BRIGHTENERS. DO NOT SOAK. USE SHORT CYCLE. SPIN DRY BRIEFLY (ABOUT 15 SECONDS), TAKE OUT IMMEDIATELY THEN PUT ON HANGER AND PULL INTO SHAPE BEFORE DRYING. PLEASE NOTE, USE OF LAUNDRY STARCH AFFECTS SHAPE STABILITY AND TEXTURE. MODERATE REMAINING WRINKLES CAN BE TIDIED UP WITH SIMPLE IRONING. WHEN CLEANING, AVOID HIGH- TEMPERATURE/MOISTURE PRESSING WHICH WILL GIVE A SOFT FINISH. THE FABRIC OF THIS PRODUCT IS RESIN-COATED. EVEN IF THE PRODUCT IS STORED UNUSED, THE COATING WILL DETERIORATE OR PEEL OFF OVER TIME AS WELL AS DUE TO HUMIDITY, UV RAYS, HEAT, DIRT, AND OTHER FACTORS. DAMPNESS AND FRICTION MAY CAUSE COLOR TRANSFER. AVOID USING THE DRYER WHEN WASHING AT HOME. LET COMPLETELY DRY IN A WELL-VENTILATED PLACE BEFORE STORING. IMPROPER HANDLING MAY ACCELERATE DETERIORATION. MADE IN 2020.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- A sophisticated sweater with a distinctive +J color block design.
- Luxurious 100% cashmere.
- Made with extra-long pile combed cashmere for a soft feel.
- Color block design in a quintessentially +J color palette.
- The hem and cuffs feature a substantial Milano rib-knit finish.
items.name: MEN Cashmere Crew Neck Long Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: A sophisticated sweater combining the lovely texture of 100% cashmere and a distinctive +J color block design. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.

- Glossy lining. Grosgrain tape adds a design accent to the pockets.
- Elastic shirring inside the cuffs and the back hem for a perfectly fitted feel.
